phrase_in_my_opinion_we: In my opinion, we should focus on the quality.
phrase_i_used_to_play: I used to play football when I was younger.

phrase_im_interested_in_learning: I'm interested in learning more about your culture.
phrase_could_you_tell_me: Could you tell me how to get to the city center?

phrase_if_i_were_you: If I were you, I would talk to him.
